Game.Name: MAER Heaven - Knockin' on Heaven's Door (Japan)
Game.plot: Mar Heaven: Knockin' on Heaven's Door is an Action game, developed by Alpha Unit and published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 2005.Cheat: Get the smith lists of CLASS 5 ÄRM magicstoneType these password on the screen of Smithing (the girl).Cheat: Get the smith lists of CLASS 5 ÄRM magicstoneIn the treasure chest inside Jack's house, after the battle with Rugal Brothers
